description: This file defines an interface for capture functionalities within the WPEFramework. It declares the ICapture interface with methods for obtaining a capture name and performing a capture, as well as an embedded IStore interface for storing image data. It also provides a static method to get an instance of ICapture.

classes.name: ICapture
classes.description: An interface for capturing screen or image data, allowing implementations to define specifics for capture and storage.

classes.name: ICapture::IStore
classes.description: An embedded interface for storing image data in specific formats.

methods.name: ICapture::Name
methods.description: Returns the name of the capture instance.

methods.name: ICapture::Capture
methods.description: Performs a capture operation and stores the result using the provided IStore instance.

methods.name: ICapture::Instance
methods.description: Provides access to a singleton or factory method to retrieve an instance of ICapture.

ctags.name: ICapture
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ICapture : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
